framework.control

Class ComponentInstanceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • framework.control.ComponentInstanceManager

  • final class ComponentInstanceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created, instantiates, manages and removes component (control interfaces and modules) instances. It also delivers events registered listeners (control interfaces).

    TODO: Redesign event delivery system. Currently every control interface has its own event queue an delivery thread, even if it has no listeners registered.

    Author:
    Stefan Werner

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  ComponentInstanceManager.EventHandlerThread
      Handler to forward events to registered listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • addGeneralEventListener

        boolean addGeneralEventListener(java.lang.String ciId,
                                GeneralEventListener generalEventListener,
                                GeneralEventType... eventTypes)
        Adds a general event listener. The types of events the listener is interested in can be given. To receive all events the type GeneralEventType.GENERAL_EVENT may be used.
        Parameters:
        ciId - the CI ID
        generalEventListener - the general event listener
        eventTypes - the event types interested in
        Returns:
        true, if successful
